section.title: ejabberd - Distributed, fault-tolerant Jabber/XMPP server written in Erlang

step.screen:
$ sudo cp /etc/ejabberd/ejabberd.cfg /etc/ejabberd/ejabberd.cfg.old $ sudo ls /etc/ejabberd/ ejabberd.cfg ejabberd.cfg.old ejabberd.pem inetrc
$ sudo vim /etc/ejabberd/ejabberd.cfg
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% %% Options which are set by Debconf and managed by ucf
%% Admin user {acl, admin, {user, "neo", "netkiller.8800.org"}}.
%% Hostname {hosts, ["netkiller.8800.org"]}.
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
$ sudo ejabberdctl register neo netkiller.8800.org your_password

$ sudo ufw allow xmpp-server Rule added
$ sudo ufw allow xmpp-client Rule added

$ vim ~/.sendxmpprc
#account@host:port password neo@netkiller.8800.org chen
$ sudo chmod 600 .sendxmpprc

section.title: ejabberdctl
section.screen: $ sudo ejabberdctl set-password eva netkiller.8800.org eva

section.title: freetalk - A console based Jabber client
python-xmpp
section.screen: $ cat jabber.py import xmpp jid=xmpp.protocol.JID('neo@netkiller.8800.org') cl=xmpp.Client(jid.getDomain(),debug=[]) cl.connect() cl.auth(jid.getNode(),'chen') cl.send(xmpp.protocol.Message('neo@netkiller.8800.org','hi there')) cl.disconnect()
